articles.author: Kris Holt
articles.title: Fortnite's new season is delayed due to tech issues - Engadget
articles.description: Epic Games has delayed the start of the new Fortnite season due to a technical issue. The latest season focuses on Greek gods.
articles.content: As is always the case between seasons, Epic Games took Fortnite offline early on Friday to perform some maintenance and get the game ready for all the new stuff fans are about to enjoy. While the dow… [+1905 chars]

articles.author: HT Tech
articles.title: NASA says bus-sized asteroid will pass Earth by a close margin today; Know how fast it is travelling - HT Tech
articles.description: An Apollo-group asteroid has been tracked in its orbit and it is expected to pass Earth by a close margin today, March 8, NASA has revealed. Know how big is the asteroid and how close it will get.
articles.content: With the help of its advanced ground and space-based telescopes, NASA has revealed that as many as four asteroids are expected to pass Earth by a close margin today, March 8. Most of these asteroids … [+2054 chars]

articles.author: AFP
articles.title: Oscars 2024: Will Christopher Nolan's epic drama 'Oppenheimer' steal the spotlight? | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Oscars 2024: Oppenheimer is poised to sweep the Oscars with its acclaimed director, cast, and urgent subject matter. Barbie, its summer counterpart, is also expected to shine with technical awards and best song contenders.
articles.content: The chain reaction set off by the fusion of "Barbie" and "Oppenheimer" will come to a head this Sunday at the Oscars, where one is expected to own the red carpet, and the other to dominate the awards… [+4697 chars]
